useCase.name: Manage Referrals
useCase.description: Allow tester to manage user referrals and verify balances.

preconditions.precondition: Tester is able to access the user interface.

successEndConditions.condition: Tester successfully verifies the balance after adding a referral.

mainSequence.step: Tester instantiates a new user named "Juan".
Tester instantiates a new user named "Pedro".
Tester adds "Pedro" as a referral to "Juan".
"Juan" appends "Pedro" to the list of referrals.
